title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Developing Mathematics Teaching Methods Based on Instructional Design Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of elementary mathematics education and understanding of basic pedagogical principles
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three systematic frameworks for applying instructional design theories to elementary mathematics education
Learners can analyze and present case-based connections between learning theories (e.g., constructivism, behaviorism) and mathematics teaching methodologies
Learners can design formative assessment tools in self-directed learning environments to achieve over 80% learning effectiveness
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
